attributes.action: Make exercise a compulsory aspect of life and put higher tax on high sugar food products
attributes.additional_details: In this modern day and age, obesity has become a major problem in the United Kingdom. Statistics show that by the year 2030 approximately half of the United Kingdom's population will either succumb to obsesity or carry the risk of CHD. In order to prevent this, we must consider the possiblities of mandatory exercise and higher taxes on food products that are high in sugar. We must do this in order to improve the health of our country!
